A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A tragic waste of much-loved characters. The butchering of Luke Skywalker's character arc was heartbreaking. Despite my deep love for Star Wars from childhood\, I for one am out... This movie destroys the established lore and wipes the slate for Disney to create new stories\, but they are stories which I won't be watching. \n\nI-III\, Rogue One & IV-XI and the limits of my internal Star Wars cannon.
